2、promise的使用
//下面是解决IE兼容性问题：
//引入 <script src="https://cdn.polyfill.io/v2/polyfill.min.js"></script>
//或 <script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdn.polyfill.io/v2/polyfill.min.js?features=es6"></script>

function getServiceOption() {
	const promise = new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {
		$.ajax({
			type: "get",
			url: "/ebox/api/v1/box/member/queryBoxServiceList",
			async: true,
			headers: {
				'Content-Type': 'application/json'
			},
			success: function(data) {
				resolve(data)
			},
			error: function(msg) {
				reject(msg)
			}
		});
	})
	return promise
}

getServiceOption().then(function(data) {
	console.log(data);
	// do some thing
}, function(error) {
	console.log(error);
})
